| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cbvesum.1 | |- ( j = k -> B = C ) |

| 6 | 3, 2, 4, 5, 1 | #P_cbvmptf | |- ( j e. A |-> B ) = ( k e. A |-> C ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) tsums ( j e. A |-> B ) ) = ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) tsums ( k e. A |-> C ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_unieqi | |- U. ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) tsums ( j e. A |-> B ) ) = U. ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) tsums ( k e. A |-> C ) ) |

| 10 |  | #P_df-esum | |- sum* k e. A C = U. ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) tsums ( k e. A |-> C ) ) |
| 11 | 8, 9, 10 | #P_3eqtr4i | |- sum* j e. A B = sum* k e. A C |
